title: A Girl and Her Wolf
description: When Samara and Declan go away on their honeymoon, Emma and Colby are left with babysitting duty. With the rest of the pack also gone, they are eager to enjoy two weeks of relaxation in a quiet house with Davenport. But things in the Tala pack are never quiet. Bennett the ghost is still hanging around the house, much to Emma and Colby’s annoyance. When Colby gets his hands on Emma’s diary, the two mates are forced to revisit old memories, all while they deal with the blunders of babysitting. This action-packed, humorous novel, which reveals some of Emma and Colby’s deepest secrets, is a Howl series accompanying novel. It is meant to be read after Cursed, as it may contain series spoilers.
author: Jody Morse
